Class BoundingBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.wobblyyyy.pathfinder2.geometry.BoundingBox

  • public class BoundingBox
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for verifying numbers. I'd encourage you to not use this class, it's only still here so nothing breaks.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Colin Robertson
